name: Full Shampoo, Conditioner, and Dry Shampoo Value Set
about: What it is:A set of hair-care products for fuller-looking hair, plus a dry shampoo..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine and Medium.Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.Key Benefits:- Gives hair volume.Highlighted Ingredients:- Proprietary Amino Cleansing Complex: A sulfate-free blend that cleanses hair without stripping..Ingredient Callouts:These products are cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This set contains a volumizing shampoo and conditioner that work together to visibly plump your strands for a fuller appearance. Living Proofu2019s Proprietary Amino Cleansing Complex, a sulfate-free surfactant blend, gently yet effectively cleanses hair while helping to protect strands from styling damage and breakage. Plus, discover a dry shampoo with fast-absorbing powders that soak up oil, sweat, and odor; they are then removed with a powder-removal system..This Set Contains:- 8 oz/ 236 mL Full Shampoo.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Proprietary Amino Cleansing Complex: A sulfate-free blend that cleanses hair without stripping..-Amaranth Peptides: Visibly plump hair fibers for bouncy, fuller-looking how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to wet hair..-Lather..-Rinse..-Follow with Living Proofu2019s Full Conditioner..-Use the Dry Shampoo in between washes to maintain clean hair... Recycling Instructions:.-These Living Proof products are recyclable through TerraCycle.
